Text: be patient- it will take some time for there to be seeders on a file this size

There is something wrong with these files. They don't work well at all in media player classic. I can play them with VLC, but if I try to fast forward, the bloody thing hangs like crazy. I have only tried about ten of them so far, but all of those have the same problem.
My experience is that VLC can play just about anything, so that tells me that these files are really crapped up!
Unless I'm being stupid. That happens a lot.
Is anyone else having problems with these?
